property.name: jsonRelatedLinksKey
property.label: Related Links key
property.description: JSON key where the related links are stored within the content module.

property.name: jsonTitleKey
property.label: Title key
property.description: JSON key whrere the title text is stored within the content module.

property.name: urlParamKey
property.label: URL Param Key
property.description: Use the URL param to match against sub name on content page.
